title: "Titanic3_Clean"
output: html_notebook
---

# Load Data & Packages
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
titanic3 <- read_csv("titanic3.csv")
View(titanic3)
```

# Port of Embarkation
```{r}
titanic3 %>% 
  group_by(embarked) %>% 
  summarise(n())

titanic3$embarked[is.na(titanic3$embarked)] <- "S"
```

#Age
```{r}
titanic3 %>% 
    summarise(Min = min(age, na.rm = TRUE),
              Median = median(age, na.rm = TRUE),
              Mean = mean(age, na.rm = TRUE),
              Max = max(age, na.rm = TRUE))

age_mean <- mean(titanic3$age, na.rm = TRUE)
titanic3$age[is.na(titanic3$age)] <- age_mean
```

#Lifeboat
```{r}
class(titanic3$boat)
titanic3$boat <- as.character(titanic3$boat)
titanic3$boat[is.na(titanic3$boat)] <- "NA"
```

#Cabin
```{r}
titanic3 <- titanic3 %>% 
    mutate(has_cabin_number = ifelse(!is.na(cabin), 1, 0))
```

#Export CSV
```{r}
head(titanic3)
write.csv(titanic3, "titanic3_clean.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
